options.content:
## Metrics collected from IBM Spectrum Virtualize
    
For more information: [https://git.data.coop/nellemann/svci](https://git.data.coop/nellemann/svci)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE time > now() - 24h
list.label: System
list.name: system
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE time > now() - 24h

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "node_stats" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE "system" =~ /$system/  AND time > now() - 24h
list.label: Node
list.name: node
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "node_stats" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE "system" =~ /$system/  AND time > now() - 24h
